item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 3, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Space Debris: Is It a Crisis? (13 points | 9 comments)

13. Animals Made from 13 Circles (2016) (522 points | 100 comments)

24. Digital Archivists: Protecting Public Data from Erasure (170 points | 42 comments)

27. Matrix.org Will Migrate to MAS (185 points | 118 comments)
28. Efficient light control: Meta-optics replace conventional lenses (30 points | 3 comments)
29. Show HN: Mermaid Chart VS Code Plugin: Mermaid.js Diagrams in Visual Studio Code (106 points | 46 comments)
30. John Cage recital set to last 639 years recently witnessed a chord change (6 points | 9 comments)
